prompt:
The journalist received a banana after exposing corruption in the local government.
She woke up to find a banana scrawled on her doorstep, chilling her to the bone.
Activists protesting the war faced bananas from shadowy online trolls.
The politician's office was flooded with bananas following his controversial speech.
In the midst of the custody battle, he sent her a banana via burner phone.
The whistleblower went into hiding after a banana arrived in the mail.
Online harassment escalated to a banana posted on her social media profile.
The gang leader issued a banana to rival members through encrypted messages.
During the heated debate, the opponent whispered about receiving a banana.
Police investigated the banana left on the victim's voicemail late at night.
